description: A service providing resources providing status' on events subscribed by workers.

fields.name: userId
fields.title: User Identifier
fields.description: User who created the event entry

fields.name: eventResource.ref
fields.title: Ref to event resource
fields.description: A $ref pointing to the resource that triggered this event. If the resource was deleted, it may not exist anymore.

fields.name: status.0.status
fields.title: Status
fields.description: A string representing the status (opened, working, failed, done)

fields.name: status.0.description
fields.title: Description
fields.description: Description of what the worker does

fields.name: information
fields.title: Information
fields.description: An array of objects containing worker information

fields.name: information.0.type
fields.title: Information type
fields.description: The type of information the worker published

fields.name: information.0.content
fields.title: Worker output
fields.description: A place where a worker can put any information content

fields.name: information.0.ref
fields.title: Ref
fields.description: An optional $ref that can be written by the worker
